game.name: Pookie has a Fantasy 3 : Finale
game.shortDescription: A cozy slice-of-life visual novel about love, dreams, and commitment. Support Pookie as she becomes a game developer, face real-life hurdles together, and decide if your relationship is strong enough to lead to marriage and a shared future.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy slice-of-life visual novel about love, dreams, and commitment. Support Pookie as she becomes a game developer, face real-life hurdles together, and decide if your relationship is strong enough to lead to marriage and a shared future.
